summary:
Carol is the Seventh Captain Marvel or something like that

 Marvel Comics only…

 1. Mar-Vell, a Kree soldier who realizes “Are...
text:
Carol is the Seventh Captain Marvel or something like that

Marvel Comics only…

1. Mar-Vell, a Kree soldier who realizes “Are we the baddies?” and turns Cosmic Defender. Dies of cancer.
2. Monica Rambeau, a police captain who is a marvel, gets light/energy powers, joins the Avengers. Later becomes Photon. Later becomes Pulsar.
3. Genis-Vell, Mar-Vell’s long lost son. In the 90s was EXTREME. Goes crazy, rewrites reality. Later becomes Photon. Dies of inconsistent writing.
4. Phyla-Vell, Mar-Vell’s long lost daughter thanks to Genis’s reality warping. Lesbian. Marries a dragon. Dies to raise stakes in cosmic storylines.
5. Khn'nr, Skrull in deep cover impersonating a time-lost Mar-Vell. Dies to heroically inspire…
6. Noh-Varr, alternate universe Kree soldier formerly known as Marvel Boy, to become an Avenger. He joins Norman Osborn’s Dark Avengers. Oops.
7. Carol Danvers, formerly Ms. Marvel, formerly Warbird, then Ms. Marvel again, takes on Captain Marvel’s title.

Yeah. Seven is my count.

COMICS EVERYBODY!

reblog.comment: https://forum.rpg.net/showthread.php?834131-Captain-Marvel-trailer-is-up&p=22133620#post22133620

summary:
Captain Marvel Yeeeee finally the first teaser of the first marvel heroine to have a movie
of her own!  (Widow I'm still waiting...
caption:
Captain Marvel

Yeeeee finally the first teaser of the first marvel heroine to have a movie of her own! 

(Widow I’m still waiting on that yours, what the hell !! -make me also a Clint-movie PLEEEEEEASE !!!) 

I am excited and I can’t wait to come out at the cinema!
Ok I know that they released the trailer now almost a week ago … but I’m slow to post … mea culpa sorry! XP
ANYWAY…
Nick Fury young and with both eyes, He doesn’t look like himself without a pirate’s bandage and that black leather trenchcoat … watching the trailer, him reminded me very much the character of Jules Winnfield of Pulp Fiction … afro hair apart of course. XD

blog.name: southerngunmomma
blog.title: Family Life is Hard
blog.description:
I'm slowly, with the help of my husband, raising our 4 young boys the right way, with manners, care for others, and an intense love of anything nerdy/geeky, majority in comics, fantasy, sci-fi, Magic the Gathering, good books and classic video games. With the occasional lesson on guns. Because we are from the south, it's only natural.
And here's a link to my podcast!   anchor.fm/hotwheelsinthefridge

summary: Oh! Oh! Oh!
body:
Oh! Oh! Oh!

I just thought about this. Ok so we know that Captain Marvel is coming out in the next half a year and is centered around Carol Danvers aka Ms. Marvel. Buuuuut what if they bring in Rogue somewhere in there? I mean, she does end up killing Carol in the comics. So maybe not in this movie per say, but maybe in a future movie! Gah! Please let this be. I need more Rogue, and I mean a bad ass Rogue, not like the one from the past X-Men movies where she’s basically just a crying emotional teenager.

body:
femmetomboi mentioned you on a post “#i stan two (2) United States Air Force icons”

@laporcupina You have no idea how badly I want you to have been the Cassandra for a Rhodey/Carol connection. Your spec on MCU’s Carol was, what? Three years ago? Marvel Studios seriously needs to have an intern trawling through your corpus for inspiration. <3

Two-plus years, according to the original post, and thank you. :)

I am still kind of crazy proud of this, although it had nowhere to go. It’s a pretty efficient bit of character building and while this Carol is absolutely nothing like the one Brie Larson is going to give us… it’s not an uninteresting one.

The AU Captain Marvel Spec script.

summary: Anti-SJW Review: Captain RestingBitchFace
title: Anti-SJW Review: Captain RestingBitchFace
body:
Rejecting the idiotic victimhood-mongering notion that telling women to smile is ‘blahblah sexism blahblah street harassment blah’… 

It is a knee jerk assertion to, when seeing this resting bitch face image, say, ‘that’s a hideous & un-super-hero expression, maybe she should smile’. But being wrong about the right expression, doesn’t make you wrong about it being the wrong expression. 

Yes Dr. Strange isn’t /smiling/. Yes it would be weird to have seen that goofy grin on movie posters for a guy who’s an awesome surgeon having his hands smashed to hell only to save the world from I dunno satan or whatever. 

BUT 

  • Smiling in movie teasers & trailers is for comedies. 
  • Resting Bitch face is for lifetime-style-dramas where the heroin is nihilistically contemplating suicide–not comic book movies.  

The all around wrong assertion that the problem with this shot of Miss Marvel, is that Miss Marvel isn’t smiling, and the missing the point entirely assertion that ‘oh look men not smiling shows the double standard in disliking this image’, ignores the fact that Dr. Strange HASN’T GOT RESTING BITCH FACE.

He’s got a quizzical look. He’s emoting. He’s acting for the still frame camera.

At no point in Dr. Strange did he  have resting bitch face. And fans should be forgiven for confusing Miss Marvel with Wonder Woman, since she is literally Marvel’s answer to wonder woman. But if this movie is filled with resting bitch face reactions to sad or disturbing moments, that will just show that the casting choice was all wrong. Because super-heroes act and react. They don’t get a glossed over I hate everything look on their faces in any circumstance. 

If it’s horrifying they’re horrified. 

If they’re despondent, they’re despondent.

They don’t look at the camera like there’s a misbehaving child they’re tired of dealing with. Ever. 

Unless there is literally a misbehaving child they’re tired of dealing with. But even then that expression should still usually be a couple degrees off from resting bitch face; or at least broken up with flinching and eventual reaction. 

I doubt that’s the case with the resting bitch face in the desert though. 

I recently saw an episode of Frasier, where the good Dr. merely wanted to strike up a conversation with the ‘common folk’ of America congenially in a diner as one might do, and in the attempt the farmer he approached reacted by self importantly extolling his impenetrable complexity in an off putting way. This character could never have become a main character explicitly because he was introduced in the most unlikeable way imaginable. If people hate Miss Marvel, It’s going to be because she’s off putting. And if she’s off putting it will be at least in part because of this resting bitch face.

And recognizing this does not make anyone sexist or hateful, it makes us better human-ers than SJWs who put selling their agenda above acknowledging human nature.

PS: We all know what costume comic fans would have preferred. 

But even that costume wouldn’t help the chronic resting bitch face. Much.

summary: Obviously we don’t know the entire plot of the Captain Marvel movie or the timeline of events in it, but I like to think some...
body: Obviously we don’t know the entire plot of the Captain Marvel movie or the timeline of events in it, but I like to think some SHIELD agent had to let Carol borrow civilian/human clothes after they pick her up because all she really has is her Starforce uniform, so she’s actually walking around in Maria Hill’s or Melinda May’s NIN shirt, leather jacket, and SHIELD cap lol.
